title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, a sprinkle of salt, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted veggies, and creamy tahini dressing.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes topped with fresh blueberries and maple syrup.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing, topped with parmesan and croutons.
